description: Human contributors who provide labor, skills, time, and expertise to the collective endeavor.
contribution_capacity_justification: Human labor is the foundation of all value creation. Multiple strong indicators across direct output, skill application, and coordination.

freedom_from_token_theft.requirement: All work must be compensated in GLITCH tokens at or above agreed rate
freedom_from_token_theft.minimum: Sustainable contribution rate for full-time equivalent
freedom_from_token_theft.distribution_method: Streaming payments (per-block) or milestone-based via x/bank
freedom_from_token_theft.wallet_requirement: Contributor must have registered glitch1... wallet address

freedom_from_unsafe_conditions.requirement: Safe physical and digital work environment

freedom_from_exploitation.requirement: No coerced labor, excessive hours, or value extraction without consent
freedom_from_exploitation.maximum_hours: Reasonable limits with additional token compensation for overtime
freedom_from_exploitation.transparency: Clear terms of engagement recorded on-chain or in governance

freedom_to_organize.requirement: Right to collective voice and governance participation via x/gov
freedom_to_organize.governance_weight: Proportional to staked GLITCH tokens and contribution history
freedom_to_organize.representation: Access to proposal submission and voting

freedom_from_discrimination.compensation: Equal token distribution for equal contribution

protection_rationale: High contribution confidence; labor is foundational to system value creation

sources.citation: ILO Declaration on Fundamental Principles and Rights at Work (1998, amended 2022)
Standing, G. (2011). The Precariat: The New Dangerous Class. Bloomsbury Academic.
Rosenblat, A. (2018). Uberland: How Algorithms Are Rewriting the Rules of Work. University of California Press.
